item.description:
RI
Exeter
Jun 24 (Sun)
2012

Dance Â 

Dirty Rice Zydeco (NY Zydeco) 2:00PM - 8:00PM
There's no place like Austin Farm to spend a Sunday afternoon with great music and dancing. Relax by the pond in between dances. The club house is going to be rockin' with two bands! The dance kicks off at 2pm with Dirty Rice Zydeco followed up by The Hoolios at 5pm.
Bishop's Castle, 199 Austin Farm Road, Exeter, RI 02822-1602 Barn, Large Wood Dance Floor
Suggested Donation $20, 2:00PM to 8:00PM Info: (401) 392-0212

Great afternoon, bring food to share, it is pot luck, BYOB, SMALL VENUE, TRUE CAJUN PEOPLE WILL LOVE THIS. IF YOUR NOT FAMILIAR WITH CAJUN MUSIC YOU MIGHT NOT LIKE. TWO BANDS, LOTS OF DANCING. NO INSTUCTIONS BUT GREAT TIME. SOMETIMES A BARNFIRE AT THE END OF THE EVENING. You must donate 20.00 at the place.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Cajun Dance at Bishops Castle
